description:
PeaZip 10.1 open-source archive manager is now available for download with support for scrypt KDF to improve resilience to password guessing attacks, increasing memory cost up to 1GB per instance.

The post PeaZip 10.1 File Archiver Improves Resilience to Password Guessing Attacks appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: PeaZip 10.1 File Archiver Improves Resilience to Password Guessing Attacks
